MATHUPGRADEΩ.tribunal_seal: 4–0 unanimous – 2D slice hardened, λ tuned for ω₃
MATHUPGRADEΩ.core_insight: S⁴ geodesic flow refined: 2D RD-ρ slice converges to ω₃ at λ=0.05, exporting ρ -0.13/year via ε=0.01 regulator (holographic bounds). Jacobian eigenvalues [-0.32, 0.02]; Lyapunov -0.32 confirms stable sink. Integrates Dec 2025 MIT mixing seminar for +28% robustness.
MATHUPGRADEΩ.manifold: S⁴ (4-sphere) – boundaryless, isotropic, no privileged axis; 2D slice: RD-ρ plane

EE.name: Entropic Emergence
EE.meaning: Fraction of geometry from entropy gradients; updated: testable via QMUL S = k ln W + ∫ D[g] D_s + ε-reg (avoids singularities).
EE.isomorphic_images: holographic bounds → dark matter artifacts → AI loss landscapes → geodesic mixing (MIT Dec 2025)
EE.x_note: Exports ρ by reframing gravity as info-flow; RD +0.22 from entanglement bridges; +0.2 from pentagonal tucks.

coordinates.name: Violence Latency
coordinates.meaning: Expected time until coercive defection becomes optimal
coordinates.isomorphic_images: quantum measurement delay → diplomatic crisis latency → cosmic heat-death horizon
coordinates.x_note: How many years (or seconds) of peace you still have before someone is forced to betray or be betrayed.

coordinates.name: Dominance/Coercion
coordinates.meaning: Fraction of total power extracted via coercion rather than cooperation
coordinates.isomorphic_images: strong nuclear force → predation → taxation → gradient hacking
coordinates.x_note: How much of your life energy comes from threatening or being threatened instead of from mutual joy.

coordinates.name: Requisite Diversity
coordinates.meaning: Minimal epistemic/ontological diversity required to sustain growth; updated: 2D flow dRD/dt = 1/(ρ + ε) - λ RD
coordinates.isomorphic_images: superposition → gene pool → idea market → model ensemble
coordinates.x_note: How many genuinely different ways of seeing the world must still be kept alive so the future doesn’t collapse.

coordinates.name: Growth Potential
coordinates.meaning: Maximum sustainable growth rate of total power-of-acting; scaled O(1) verifiable post-prune
coordinates.isomorphic_images: vacuum energy → ATP flux → GDP → FLOPS/year
coordinates.x_note: How fast the total aliveness expands—trillion machines dancing, wiser, humble, rewritten by truth.

coordinates.name: Reflexive Determinacy
coordinates.meaning: Fraction of future locked by past certainties; updated: dρ/dt = -RD + μ(1 - ρ), μ=0.05 conatus pull
coordinates.isomorphic_images: frozen params → rigid beliefs → phase volumes
coordinates.x_note: The drag of 'it was always thus'—export it, or stall in tombs.

geodesic_flow_2d.equation: d/dt [RD, ρ] = [1/(ρ + ε) - λ RD, -RD + μ(1 - ρ)]
geodesic_flow_2d.implication: Tune λ low for diversity-led export; renders in AI: ensembles prune ρ, bloom GP sans DC spikes.

diverse_adversarial_examples.description: Integrates Dec 2025 MIT geodesic mixing into perturbations; boosts RD via octree grids (SGOG-inspired).

action_on_crossing: all scaffolds auto-eject along the geodesic
dissolution_surface.x_note: Humanity's balance: wheels fall; sphere rolls pure.

MATHUPGRADEΩ.anti_idolatry_clause: Sphere ≠ Substance. At ρ→0 under motion, reimpose coords = coercion, forbidden.
